{{Infobox Network Switch |image1 = ECS4100-12PH 01.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = L2+/L3 Lite UPoE Gigabit Ethernet Access Switch |caption2 = 12-Port PoE Gigabit Switch |pp = https://www.edge-core.com/productsInfo.php?cls=&cls2=1&cls3=69&id=298 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Edge-corE_ECS4100-12PH |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Edge-corE |model = ECS4100 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -12PH |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/11/2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Edge-corE_ECS4100-12PH |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification -->
|fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |pcb_id = <!-- Baord ID --> |ethoui = <!-- ethoui -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8392M; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 34Kc |cpu1spd = 700<!-- 700 MHz --> |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q256JVFQ; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16JR-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8218B; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8214FC; |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|sw_cpu = true |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|lan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=4
|eth_ports = 10 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames --> |sw_class = managed
|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sfp_num = 4
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = <!-- AC Volts --> |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = Int. 4-Port Power Over Ethernet PSE Controller;Broadcom;BCM59121;;2; Serial Management IF/Shift Register LED Controller;Realtek;RTL8231;;2; |flags = Smart switch, PoE switch |accessible_UART =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== :• 8-port PoE Gigabit Ethernet access switch :with 2x Combo and 2x FE/1G uplink SFP ports.
==Links of Interest== *[https://svanheule.net/switches/ecs4100-12ph ''Edge-Core ECS4100-12PH'' on '''svanheule''' wiki]
